articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: The Taliban says US has agreed to provide humanitarian aid to Afghanistan during talks in Doha - ABC News
articles.description: American and Taliban officials have held talks in Doha, with a spokesman for the militant group saying the US will provide aid but is refusing to recognise Afghanistan's new rulers.
articles.content:
The US has agreed to provide humanitarian aid but refused to give political recognition to Afghanistan's new rulers, the Taliban says.
<ul><li>The US was less definitive, saying the two sides "discu… [+2681 chars]

articles.title: US aerospace firm Pratt & Whitney to hire another 250 employees in Singapore as it prepares for recovery - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: American aerospace manufacturer Pratt & Whitney is looking to fill around 250 jobs in Singapore by the end of this year, with more positions to come in 2022, as it readies itself for a recovery from the COVID-19 pandemic.
